tags.human: data generated by humans without AI in mind
tags.crowd-sourced: data collected via human crowd-sourcing platforms to train AI models

tags.monolithic: continuous, unstructured blocks of text useful for pretraining
tags.dialog: data that can be segmented into individual turns (e.g., `user, llm, python-tool, llm, user, llm, user, llm`)
tags.tool use: data illustrating the integration of external tools

tags.filtration: data obtained by filtering a large chunk of the internet
tags.compilation: a mixture of sources compiled for training purposes
tags.atomic: data from a single, consistent source (e.g., standardized exam sets)
tags.benchmark: datasets originally created for evaluation or benchmarking

tags.answer:verifiable: answers can be independently verified (e.g., factual or numerical)

tags.mathematics: focused on math problems and reasoning
tags.programming: focused on coding and software tasks
